problem_text_cn: 如图,圆O是△ABC的外接圆,∠BAC与∠ABC的平分线相交于点I,延长AI交圆O于点D,连结BD、DC．若圆O的半径为8,∠BAC=120°,则DI的长度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the circle O is the circumscribed circle of △ABC, and the bisector of ∠BAC and ∠ABC intersects at point I. Extend AI and it intersects circle O at point D. Connect BD and DC. If the radius of circle O is N_0, ∠BAC = N_1, then the length of DI is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵AI平分∠BAC,∴∠BAD=∠DAC,∴⁀{BD}=⁀{CD},∴BD=DC．∵BI平分∠ABC,∴∠ABI=∠CBI．∵∠BAD=∠DAC,∠DBC=∠DAC,∴∠BAD=∠DBC．
又∵∠DBI=∠DBC+∠CBI,∠DIB=∠ABI+∠BAD,∴∠DBI=∠DIB,∴△BDI为等腰三角形,∴BD=ID,∴BD=DC=DI．∵∠BAC=120°,△ABC为钝角三角形,∴圆心O在△ABC外．
连接OB、OD、OC．∵BD=CD,∴⁀{BD}=⁀{CD},∴∠DOC=∠BOD=2∠BAD=120°,∴∠DBC=∠DCB=60°,∴△BDC为正三角形．
延长CO交BD于点E,则OE⊥BD,∴BE=\frac{1}{2}BD,
又∵OB=18,∴BD=2OB\cos30°=2×8×\frac{√{3}}{2}=√{3}8,∴DI=BD=8√{3},
故选:D．
